page.title: 15My hobby - Fishing
page.content: My hobby is fishing I like it because I like catching tench,rudd and pike and all the other fishes as well.We go down the compost heap to get the worms.We put in for grond bait as well.We put muck in for the worms.We take my fishing rod and fishing takle.I put the hook on the rod and bait it and hold it untill the float goes under when it goes under I have got a fish it is usually a pike,tench or rudd and I wind it in I take it out of the water and put it back in and let it swim away.
